text: Tsenku Falls is a waterfall located near Dodowa in the Greater Accra Region of Ghana Tsenku waterfall drops from a height of about 250 feet and is running on stratified rocks into a cool and clean pool with a large tilapia population.https://ghana.peacefmonline.com/pages/tourism/waterfalls/tsenku_waterfalls/ The Tsenku Waterfalls, also referred to as Wuruduwurudu, is within the Po stream valley is joined by two other streams "Sanyade" and "Popotsi" before it meanders into the sea. ==References== Category:Waterfalls of Ghana
title: Tsenku Waterfall
